channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] Qiskit Runtime (quantum-computing) has changed the description of the plan named paygo-standard
item.description:
*before*: **Systems** 127 qubit Eagle processors. Time limits = program-specific up to 8 hours. Qiskit Runtime Second = time counted to process a job. No charge for job queue time.
**Simulators** *(Note: Simulators are deprecated and will be removed soon)* Five simulators (QASM, statevector, mps, stabilizer, and extended stabilizer). Time limits = program-specific up to 3 hours.
**Performance management strategies** Two strategies: • IBM 3 resilience levels. • Q-CTRL AI-driven automated error reduction. **No additional cost. Only available in us-east region**., *after*: **Quantum processing units** 127 qubit Eagle processors. Time limits = program-specific up to 8 hours. Qiskit Runtime Second = time counted to process a job. No charge for job queue time.
**Simulators** *(Note: Simulators are deprecated and will be removed soon)* Five simulators (QASM, statevector, mps, stabilizer, and extended stabilizer). Time limits = program-specific up to 3 hours.
**Performance management strategies** Two strategies: • IBM 3 resilience levels. • Q-CTRL AI-driven automated error reduction. **No additional cost. Only available in us-east region**.
